content:
SqlManagementClient SqlManagementClient Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Sql
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Sql.dll

The Windows Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Windows Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases and servers.

Edit

In this Article

public class SqlManagementClient : ServiceClient<SqlManagementClient>, ISqlManagementClient, IDisposablePublic Class SqlManagementClient
    Inherits ServiceClient(Of SqlManagementClient)
    Implements ISqlManagementClient, IDisposable

Value
String String

AuditingPolicy AuditingPolicy

Edit

Represents all the operations to manage Azure SQL Database and Database Server Audit policy. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve and Update audit policy.

public virtual IAuditingPolicyOperations AuditingPolicy { get; }Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AuditingPolicy As IAuditingPolicyOperations
Value
IAuditingPolicyOperations IAuditingPolicyOperations

BaseUri BaseUri

Edit

Gets the URI used as the base for all cloud service requests.

public Uri BaseUri { get; }Public ReadOnly Property BaseUri As Uri
Value
Uri Uri

BlobAuditing BlobAuditing

Edit

Represents all the operations to manage Azure SQL Database and Server blob auditing. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve and Update blob auditing settings.

public virtual IBlobAuditingOperations BlobAuditing { get; }Public Overridable ReadOnly Property BlobAuditing As IBlobAuditingOperations
Value
IBlobAuditingOperations IBlobAuditingOperations

Capabilities Capabilities

Edit

Represents all the operations for determining the set of capabilites available in a specified region.

public virtual ICapabilitiesOperations Capabilities { get; }Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Capabilities As ICapabilitiesOperations
Value
ICapabilitiesOperations ICapabilitiesOperations

CommunicationLinks CommunicationLinks

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Server communication links. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete.

public virtual IServerCommunicationLinkOperations CommunicationLinks { get; }Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CommunicationLinks As IServerCommunicationLinkOperations
Value

public SubscriptionCloudCredentials Credentials { get; }Public ReadOnly Property Credentials As SubscriptionCloudCredentials
Value
SubscriptionCloudCredentials SubscriptionCloudCredentials

DatabaseActivation DatabaseActivation

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating pertaining to activation on Azure SQL Data Warehouse databases. Contains operations to: Pause and Resume databases

public virtual IDatabaseActivationOperations DatabaseActivation { get; }Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DatabaseActivation As IDatabaseActivationOperations
Value
IDatabaseActivationOperations IDatabaseActivationOperations

DatabaseAdvisors DatabaseAdvisors

Edit

Represents all the operations for managing Advisors for Azure SQL Databases. Contains operations to retrieve Advisors and update auto execute status of an Advisor.

public virtual IDatabaseAdvisorOperations DatabaseAdvisors { get; }Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DatabaseAdvisors As IDatabaseAdvisorOperations
Value
IDatabaseAdvisorOperations IDatabaseAdvisorOperations

DatabaseBackup DatabaseBackup

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database database backups.

public virtual IDatabaseBackupOperations DatabaseBackup { get; }Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DatabaseBackup As IDatabaseBackupOperations
Value
IDatabaseBackupOperations IDatabaseBackupOperations

DatabaseRecommendedActions DatabaseRecommendedActions

Edit

Represents all the operations for managing recommended actions on Azure SQL Databases. Contains operations to retrieve recommended action and update its state.

public virtual IDatabaseRecommendedActionOperations DatabaseRecommendedActions { get; }Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DatabaseRecommendedActions As IDatabaseRecommendedActionOperations
Value
IDatabaseRecommendedActionOperations IDatabaseRecommendedActionOperations

DatabaseReplicationLinks DatabaseReplicationLinks

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Replication Links. Contains operations to: Delete and Retrieve replication links.

public virtual IReplicationLinkOperations DatabaseReplicationLinks { get; }Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DatabaseReplicationLinks As IReplicationLinkOperations
Value
IReplicationLinkOperations IReplicationLinkOperations

Databases Databases

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Databases. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete databases, and also includes the ability to get the event logs for a database.

public virtual IDatabaseOperations Databases { get; }Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Databases As IDatabaseOperations
Value
IDatabaseOperations IDatabaseOperations

DataMasking DataMasking

Edit

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database data masking. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete data masking rules, as well as Create, Retreive and Update data masking policy.

public virtual IDataMaskingOperations DataMasking { get; }Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DataMasking As IDataMaskingOperations
Value
IDataMaskingOperations IDataMaskingOperations

Represents all the operations for managing Advisors for Azure SQL Elastic Database Pool. Contains operations to retrieve Advisors and update auto execute status of an Advisor.

public virtual IElasticPoolAdvisorOperations ElasticPoolAdvisors { get; }Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ElasticPoolAdvisors As IElasticPoolAdvisorOperations
Value
IElasticPoolAdvisorOperations IElasticPoolAdvisorOperations

Value
IElasticPoolRecommendedActionOperations IElasticPoolRecommendedActionOperations

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database Elastic Pools. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete.

Value
IElasticPoolOperations IElasticPoolOperations

Value
